entries.description: Fix bug when Amazon Q chat sends code selection while user has no selection
Amazon Q Code Transformation: make jobId visible in job history tab at start of job and allow summary.md + icons to be saved when accepting changes
Amazon Q Chat: Typewriter animator parts showing up in code fields inside listitems
Security Scan: Addresses a bug where security issues sometimes appear multiple times
Update cross file context config for Q inline suggestion
Amazon Q: Security scans now support C, C++, and PHP files
